root.name: Rosco McQueen Firefighter Extreme
root.description: OverviewRosco McQueen must stop Sylvester T. Square and his robots from setting buildings on fire. GameplayPlayers take control of Rosco in the 3rd Person and put out 15 fires. Roscoe puts out fires by spraying them with water. In order to refill his hose, he must collect water bottles. He also carries an axe to destroy robots and get to the buildings. Watch out for the temperature, because if it gets to hot, the game ends.
